00064 
00065 SChaine::SChaine()
00066 {
00067   set_bin(0);
00068   ostringstream *os = new ostringstream();
00069   set_ostream(os);
00070 }
00071 
00072 void SChaine::setf(IOS_FORMAT code)
00073 {
00074   Sortie::setf( code );
00075 // Cerr << "Error in SChaine::setf(IOS_FORMAT code)" << finl;
00076 // Process::exit();
00077 }

00083 
00084 //
00085 //! returns a copy of the string stored by the SChaine
00086 const char* SChaine::get_str() const
00087 {
00088   const ostringstream& os = static_cast< const ostringstream& >(get_ostream());
00089 // Need a copy to make sure the char * remains unchanged even if the SChaine is further filled.
00090   string_=string(os.str());
00091   return string_.c_str();
00092 }
00093 
00094 unsigned SChaine::get_size() const
00095 {
00096   const ostringstream& os = static_cast< const ostringstream& >(get_ostream());
00097   return os.str().size();
00098 }
00099 
00100 int SChaine::set_bin(int bin)
00101 {
00102   if (bin != 0)
00103     {
00104       Cerr << "Error in SChaine::set_bin(int bin) : binary format not supported" << finl;
00105       Process::exit();
00106     }
00107   Sortie::set_bin(bin);
00108   return bin;
00109 }
